name: py-python-bioformats

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Python-bioformats is a Python wrapper for Bio-Formats, a standalone Java
library for reading and writing life sciences image file formats. Bio-
Formats is capable of parsing both pixels and metadata for a large
number of formats, as well as writing to several formats.

dependencies.name: py-future
dependencies.description: Clean single-source support for Python 3 and 2

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-python-javabridge
dependencies.description:
The python-javabridge package makes it easy to start a Java virtual
machine (JVM) from Python and interact with it.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-pathml
dependent_to.description: An open-source toolkit for computational pathology and machine learning.
